# Audio

`mp3`: add cover
`mp3`: update ID3 tags
`mp3`: upload to cdn
`mp3`: test listen

# Website

`md`: complete shownotes
`md`: update `mp3` link
`md`: update mp3 `length`
`md`: update mp3 `duration
`md`: update `episode number
`md`: update `Description`

# Final Step

`md`: undraft episode
